VTD::Internal::NetworkHandler

VTD::Internal::NetworkHandler Class Reference

Threadsafe network handler singleton. Thread safety is bound to the condition that the underlying ComHandler singleton is not used directly. More...

Static Public Member Functions

static NetworkHandler * getInstance ()

Detailed Description

Threadsafe network handler singleton. Thread safety is bound to the condition that the underlying ComHandler singleton is not used directly.
